e(t,n,r){function s(o,u){if(!n[o]){if(!t[o]){var a=typeof require==\"function\"&&require;if(!u&&a)return a(o,!0);if(i)return i(o,!0);throw new Error(\"Cannot find module '\"+o+\"'\")}var f=n[o]={exports:{}};t[o][0].call(f.exports,function(e){var n=t[o][1][e];return s(n?n:e)},f,f.exports,e,t,n,r)}return n[o].exports}var i=typeof require==\"function\"&&require;for(var o=0;o<r.length;o++)s(r[o]);return s})({1:[function(require,module,exports){\nvar sub = require('./sub');\n\nconsole.log('hello world');\nsub.hoge();\n//# sourceMappingURL=main.js.map\n\n},{\"./sub\":2}],2:[function(require,module,exports){\nfunction hoge() {\n    console.log('good morning');\n}\nexports.hoge = hoge;\n//# sub = require('./sub')\n\n\nconsole.log('hello world');\nsub.hoge();\n```\n\n```ts:sub.ts\nexport function hoge() {\n    console.log('good morning')\n}\n```\n\n----\n\ntsc\u3067\u30d3\u30eb\u30c9\u3057\u307e\u3059\u3002\n\n```bash\ntsc main.ts --module commonjs --sourcemap\n```\n\n\u5b9f\u884c\u7d50\u679c\n\n```js:main.js\nvar sub = require('./sub');\n\nconsole.log('hello world');\nsub.hoge();\n//# sourceMappingURL=main.js.map\n```\n\n```js:sub.js\nfunction hoge() {\n    console.log('good morning');\n}\nexports.hoge = hoge;\n//# sourceMappingURL=sub.js.map\n```\n\n----\n\n\u66f4\u306bbrowserify\u3067\u304f\u3063\u3064\u3051\u308b\u3068\u2026\n\n```bash\nbrowserify main.js -d -o build.js\n```\n\n\u5b9f\u884c\u7d50\u679c\n\n```js:build.js\n(function e(t,n,r){function s(o,u){if(!n[o]){if(!t[o]){var a=typeof require==\"function\"&&require;if(!u&&a)return a(o,!0);if(i)return i(o,!0);throw new Error(\"Cannot find module '\"+o+\"'\")}var f=n[o]={exports:{}};t[o][0].call(f.exports,function(e){var n=t[o][1][e];return s(n?n:e)},f,f.exports,e,t,n,r)}return n[o].exports}var i=typeof require==\"function\"&&require;for(var o=0;o<r.length;o++)s(r[o]);return s})({1:[function(require,module,exports){\nvar sub = require('./sub');\n\nconsole.log('hello world');\nsub.hoge();\n//# sourceMappingURL=main.js.map\n\n},{\"./sub\":2}],2:[function(require,module,exports){\nfunction hoge() {\n    console.log('good morning');\n}\nexports.hoge = hoge;\n//#
